abstract: Hillary Clinton focuses her criticism on presumptive Republican presidential nominee Donald J Trump, with whom polls show her tied in general election; faces continuing challenge from her Democratic rival Sen Bernie Sanders, who appeals to both her and Trump's unfavorable ratings with voters.

headline.print_headline: Clinton Stresses Need to Challenge Trump
headline.main: Hillary Clinton Warns Against Treating Donald Trump as ‘Normal’ Candidate

snippet: Continuing to act as though the Democratic contest were already over, Mrs. Clinton taunted the presumptive Republican nominee for not releasing his tax returns.
lead_paragraph: Continuing to act as though the Democratic contest were already over, Mrs. Clinton taunted the presumptive Republican nominee for not releasing his tax returns.
